parameter.name: MyConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: MyConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: ConnString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ConnString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=127.0.0.1,3306; Initial Catalog=mydb; UID=root; pwd=root; Integrated Security=True;
